article: Once upon a time there was a lazy and foolish man. He was too lazy to work _ a farmer. He went _ the village every day and did all kinds of little jobs for people. He was happy to earn enough to live on from day to day. He was very _ at climbing coconut trees. One day he was walking through a coconut plantation . The owner of the plantation _ him,"Good afternoon, my friend," the owner said, "Do you want to earn some money by climbing for coconuts?" " How much will you give me?" replied the lazy man. "I'll give you two nuts from _ tree you climb," the owner said, "And there are twenty- five trees."The lazy man _ . He started to climb one of the trees. When he _ the top, he said to himself: "There are twenty - five trees. That means there will be fifty nuts for me. If I sell the nuts, I'll get enough money to buy twice as many cheap nuts. Then I will boil the nuts and take out the oil. After that I will sell the oil and make a lot of money." " Using the money, I will buy many chickens. The chickens will grow up and lay many eggs. The eggs will hatch into chickens. I will take care of the chickens. In time those chickens will grow up and lay _ eggs. They too will hatch into other chickens. "I will then sell all the chickens and make a big profit. With the money, I'll buy some _ presents and a ship. I'll go to _ country. There I'll ask a princess to marry me ..." As he was talking to _ , the lazy man moved from side to side. He was _ . He forgot that he was up on a tree. He let go off the _ and fell to the ground.He died at once.
